 Transaction Recording Databases
 Transaction Recording Streams
U
 UVM Links
 UVM Recorders
A common function of testbenches is to compare streams of transactions for equivalence.
The UVM “Transaction Recording Database” classes are an abstract representation of the backend tool which is recording information for the user.
The uvm_link_base class, and its extensions, are provided as a mechanism to allow for compile-time safety when trying to establish links between records within a uvm_tr_database.
